author: andreas
msg: XHTMLSerializer: Don't encode characters in <script> and <style> elements to avoid JavaScript parsing errors. This behaviour has been pulled up from the HTMLSerializer. Fixes https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/COCOON-2249.

author: jleroux
msg: All tabs to 4 spaces in *.groovy, *.java, *.xml : less problems in future with that aspect...
